titleStmt.title: The shepherd, or, The pastoral charge and obedience due to it instituted by God as a necessary means to preserve the sheep from straying.
titleStmt.author: Laney, Benjamin, 1591-1675.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Attributed to Benjamin Laney. cf. NUC pre-1956.
